blogPost.excerpt: AI Conversation Flow is a powerful virtual email conversation builder to help marketing teams convert neglected leads into sales-ready hand-raisers.
blogPost.body: AI Conversation Flow is a powerful virtual email conversation builder to help marketing teams convert neglected leads into sales-ready hand-raisers.
blogPost.title: Saleswhale Email AI Conversation Flow - A new way to build intent-based lead conversion campaigns
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: AI Conversation Flow是一个强大的虚拟电子邮件对话构建器，帮助营销团队将被忽视的潜在客户转化为销售准备好的举手之劳。
localize.tagline: 建立基于意图的线索转化活动的新方法

localize.description: AI Conversation Flow是一個強大的虛擬電子郵件對話構建器，幫助營銷團隊將被忽視的潛在客戶轉化爲銷售準備好的舉手之勞。
localize.tagline: 建立基於意圖的線索轉化活動的新方法

previous.excerpt: Built from the ground up for performance. A powerful AI engine for generating copy to drive conversions. Generate or improve your own ideas for ads, social posts, email subject lines and landing pages.
previous.title: Anyword - Write your copy with an AI trained on $250M of ads

localize.description: 从底层构建的性能。强大的人工智能引擎，用于生成文案以促进转化。生成或改进您自己的广告、社交帖子、电子邮件主题行和登陆页面的想法。
localize.tagline: 用受过2.5亿美元广告训练的人工智能来写你的文案。

localize.description: 從底層構建的性能。強大的人工智能引擎，用於生成文案以促進轉化。生成或改進您自己的廣告、社交帖子、電子郵件主題行和登陸頁面的想法。
localize.tagline: 用受過2.5億美元廣告訓練的人工智能來寫你的文案。

next.excerpt: It's often difficult for most people to share their thoughts and over time it builds up in them, to let people have these thoughts free and release their burden we build this app. Here everyone can write freely without being getting judged by others.
next.title: Articled - Write where your words matter | Read & write short stories.

localize.description: 对于大多数人来说，往往很难分享自己的想法，久而久之就会积压在心里，为了让大家有这些想法自由，释放自己的负担，我们建立了这个应用。在这里，每个人都可以自由写作，而不会被别人评头论足。
localize.tagline: 写在你的文字重要的地方｜阅读和写短篇小说。

localize.description: 對於大多數人來說，往往很難分享自己的想法，久而久之就會積壓在心裏，爲了讓大家有這些想法自由，釋放自己的負擔，我們建立了這個應用。在這裏，每個人都可以自由寫作，而不會被別人評頭論足。
localize.tagline: 寫在你的文字重要的地方｜閱讀和寫短篇小說。
